author: Mellae
text:
Idk if this is making any sense to anyone 😂

But long story short I'm glad I have Fuma because he isn't fleeting - he is always there and I will always have my feelings for him 🥰💜

author: Mellae
text:
I had such an amazing weekend! like from Friday to Sunday I felt so happy & so grateful for everything 💖 & while I still feel all of that, it just feels a bit sad to go back to weekday routines...

So when I saw Fuma's face I just really felt something - like ahhhh he gets it!!

author: Mellae
text: Almost cried on the train this morning looking at Fuma's sleepy face on jweb lol 💜

author: Mellae
text: The ANNOUNCEMENT has ended me I cannot breathe I am so happy for them 😭🥰🌈✨

author: Mellae
text: Ok I got through the opening and then Yoshi appeared and now I'm crying again 😭

author: Mellae
text:
I am literally sobbing rn 😭

I just love Johnny's so much 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Ahhhhh I'm so emo over this episode I can barely watch it 😭

So many of my faves together I'm just so happy my heart can't take it 😭😭😭😭

But it also makes me miss Arashi so much 😭

author: Mellae
text:
SHOW Channel literally just started and I am already crying like 30s in 😭

Sho just looked so happy 😭❤️🥺

author: Mellae
text:
If you haven't watched today's JGR I really recommend it

I swear no matter what is happening you won't be able to stop smiling/laughing!!

For me, Shige was just too much I actually LMAO'd 🤣

author: Mellae
text:
Idk if that's like good service or capitalism at its finest 🤷🏽‍♀️

But I'm happy it's resolved especially because I've been spending a lot of money on Johnny's lately 😅

author: Mellae
text:
So I was having a minor panic about money because I had to renew a couple of things which I pay for yearly & I was like oh shit idk if I have enough credit on my card for this AFTER I purchased the things 🙈

But I applied to up my credit limit & they approved in like 2hrs 😯

author: Mellae
text:
Happy Anniversary WEST 🌈✨🎉

I hope you can spend today laughing & celebrating with each other 🥰

Can't wait to see what the future has in store for you ☀️❤️ https://t.co/EtBvANBm4L

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all I am so dead 💀 he kept talking to me about stuff and then saying "oh shall I send it to you later?" 😭😭😭

STAHP my heart cannot take this 😍

So now I have his contact and hopefully I can see him again some time if I work hard to ask him for coffee 💪🏽

author: Mellae
text: I was rehearsing so much how to ask for his Instagram or something BUT without me even saying anything he was like "add me on LINE & send me the pic" AND THEN he asked if I had Instagram!!! So he'll send it to me later and we can follow each other 😭

author: Mellae
text:
It was my last training session at the personal training gym & because of some drama that happened my usual trainer left the gym 😭 so I booked with the hot trainer guy

I gained the courage to ask him to take a photo with me & he did!!! But the best part is...

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so unrelated to Johnny's but have another gym update!!
(Today has been a ridiculously great day and I feel so blessed ☀️)

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all I cannot breeeeeathe!

Got tickets for the Sexy Zone concert this summer 🎉

I cried because I was so happy 😭🙈

I cannot believe I'm gonna be in the same space as Fuma 💜😭😭😭

I feel so so so lucky 🙏🏽🙏🏽

author: Mellae
text:
Also also!! Just how cute is Yama in those jumpers that they kept putting him in 😍😍😍

How does Fuma know that we love a soft, fluffy Yama 💜❤️

(Sorry just always have a lot of feels after new JC upload 🙈🥰)

author: Mellae
text:
Also I LOVE the 1st outfit Fuma picked for Yama 💜❤️

I can totally see how that is Fuma's style & ughhhh it makes me love him even more

I am so upset 😂💜💜💜💜

author: Mellae
text: Fuma is like such a big baby and I mean that in the most loving way possible 🥰 the way he interacts with Nakamaru is just sooooo cute & whiny & why are u like that??!! 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🙈🥰

author: Mellae
text: Was shopping for clothes online and realised I was getting so excited over anything pastel purple & I feel like that's Fuma's fault 💜😂

author: Mellae
text:
Cannot wait for Sho's face when he's with Nino ❤️💛

Cannot wait for Fuma's face when he is with Sho ❤️💜

Cannot wait for Yama & Nakamaru to be all shy 🥰😂

Show Channel is gonna be good this weekend I can feel it ✨😍

author: Mellae
text:
Flailing internally over a sliver of Fuma's face he posted on jweb while I'm on the train home / slightly tipsy

Is it the alcohol or Fuma that makes me feel this way? 💜😂😂

author: Mellae
text:
I feel so grateful today 🙏🏽🙏🏽

Without Johnny's I wouldn't have had so many opportunities, so many experiences, so many great memories ❤️

I'm truly thankful to be able to live this life &, while it's not entirely down to Johnny's, they have played a huge part in changing my life

author: Mellae
text:
Went to see Yabu in Joseph today!! 💚

My seat was right in the middle and close to the stage so had a really good view of him 👀✨

He was literally shining 😍
He looked so good!
His singing is amazing!
He's just so adorable!
& seems like the most loveable onii-chan 🥰 https://t.co/w7m50wTnrn

author: Mellae
text:
Liking Fuma and being in the same generation as him is so weird

Because when I look at pics of Arashi from the 2000s or something it's like 'Ah yes, my type 🙂' or something like that

But looking at pics of Fuma from the same time is like flashbacks to my youth 😂 & feels odd

author: Mellae
text:
Btw asking some advice for people in multiple FCs - how do you keep up with emails & tracking content??

I keep missing deadlines for stuff and it's becoming a bit overwhelming 😢

author: Mellae
text: Omg lol someone randomly retweeted one of my emo tweets from 2014 and for some reason people keep interacting with it & I just don't want to be reminded of it 😂 I don't even remember who the tweet was about haha

author: Mellae
text:
It's OK though! Next time I will challenge myself to do it 💪🏽

It would be cool if I can just be more friendly with him & I think this is really good for me to get out of my comfort zone!

So I failed at getting over my crush but at least it's become less stressful haha 😅😅

author: Mellae
text:
I really wanted to try add him on social media or something and say that I'll send some recommendations because of course I have lots to say about my profession but I just want more of an opportunity to connect with him

Sadly I didn't get the chance to ask 😭😭😭

author: Mellae
text: But the part I think is so cute is that he's interested in counselling/coaching & (I guess maybe not many people know on here but I work as a therapist) so we were talking about that and he was asking me for advice on studying more 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
"Oh I'm sorry I forgot! Our discussion was so interesting (I got distracted)!" (I paraphrased from Japanese)

And y'all when I say my heart melted.... 😍

author: Mellae
text:
Today we talked about his interests & hobbies - some of them are not really my thing but we could somehow bond over where our interests intersected!

& we were supposed to do this one exercise at the end of the session but when we both realised it was too late 😅 he was like...

author: Mellae
text:
So I challenged myself today to ask him questions and have a more reciprocal convo since I let him ask me a lot last time

So I learned a lot more about him & it's just so frustrating that we have a lot in common 😅 & just makes me interested in him more

author: Mellae
text:
The update that no one asked for but...

I had another session today with the hot trainer at my gym (because my regular trainer had to change her shift 😭)

& I swore to myself that I would get over my crush on him because I can't keep stressing myself out

author: Mellae
text:
I never thought I would say this but...

There is just never enough Fuma for me on a daily basis 😭💜

I know it's selfish but I just want to be with him all the time 😅

author: Mellae
text:
Obviously his hamburger hands are cute too 😍💛

He's so squishy 🤗

author: Mellae
text: Nino's lil feet in the new Anan are so cute 🥰💛

author: Mellae
text:
Look who I found on the train 😍

Made me so happy to see him after a hard day at work 💛 https://t.co/eNKWaKQQWr

author: Mellae
text: Watched Kenty's movie on Netflix yesterday & I have no words... Only feelings 😭😭🔥😭😭

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all I just saw a vid that Kinpuri uploaded on Insta with Ren acting like a boyfriend... 👀

That's dangerous content... 😳

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so I made a new wallpaper for my phone - it's not very fancy or anything but I did my best and I kinda like it! I felt like if it was this picture & these Johnny's then I could change my home screen...

If anyone likes it then let me know and I can share! https://t.co/zxZjgVHUUW

author: Mellae
text:
Bought the fumaken beer lol

The foam is ridiculous lol but kinda fun 😊 Taste is kinda normal too 👍🏼

I guess just thinking about Fuma made it special & made me feel happy

author: Mellae
text:
Saw someone post about how TANG Nino reminded them of Assassination Classroom 2 Nino

And tell me why it makes so much more sense to me that lately I've been having a lot of Nino feels

Because that is the Nino I fell for in like 2016/7 😂💛

author: Mellae
text:
So stressed at work today

It seems like I only get stressed on days when there is a lot of Johnny's content

Which is good for me because usually I can overcome it quickly but I'm starting to wonder why that is 😂🤔

author: Mellae
text:
New SexyZone album!! 🥳

So excited for a Sexy Summer this year 😂

But in all seriousness I am so happy for them! It's been a long time 🥰✨

author: Mellae
text:
Still thinking about yesterday's Jyanino video...

I could write an essay on why it was so good 😂

author: Mellae
text: Read Shori's post on jweb yesterday and ugh this boy is gonna make me cry he's so cute 😭🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Latest Jyanino video is basically my kryptonite like who allowed this to be free content?!?! 😭😭

I would pay so much money to see the three of them just chatting about Johnny's / drama / movie memories ❤️💛💜

Don't get even me started on Fuma in that vid...😭😭😭😭

author: Mellae
text: Fun fact this is my first time to buy a Johnny's album that wasn't Arashi's... So kind of feels like a big deal!

author: Mellae
text: Also another fave thing is that I use the orange heart for Yoshi & the purple heart for Fuma BUT it's the same colours as Yoshi X Jun so that makes me happy too because that is my all time fave Yoshi & Johnny's interaction 😍✨

author: Mellae
text:
Excuse me but Shige is so cute 🥰❤️

I know he's like filming something or whatever but he is so pure 🥺😍 https://t.co/BkIsTeNUvD

author: Mellae
text:
Feeling frustrated after work today & looking for any Johnny's content to make me feel better lol & then I got sad because it made me miss Sho so much 🥺❤️

At least SHOW channel is on today 👍🏼✨

author: Mellae
text:
Anyone else watch Bridgerton? I sacrificed my sleep last night to binge the new season!

It was so good ☺️ (for the most part - some bits were boring lol)

Also been watching business proposal & heavily invested in the ending of this drama 🙈

author: Mellae
text:
Reading Fuma's jweb & this boy is so relatable 💜

& When he uses puns it reminds me of Sho ❤️😭

author: Mellae
text:
Today's Fuma thought:

*looking at a pic of his side profile*
"So unfair. I could cut myself on his jaw it's so sharp."

😂💜

author: Mellae
text:
I mean at the end of the day I know this is just like a lil crush and probably nothing will happen 😂 but it's kind of fun and makes me go out my comfort zone

So I'm thinking about booking more sessions with him like 1 week with my trainer & 1 week with him

We'll see!! 😄

author: Mellae
text:
Things I learned about him that are so cute:

- he likes pancakes
- he tries hard to speak English with me/repeat when I say words in English
- he likes psychology
- he wants to travel

author: Mellae
text:
It started off a bit awkward because I think we were both like trying to figure how this was going to work lol

But he is soooo nice 😭 and he asked me about Arashi & lots of questions & we have lots in common

author: Mellae
text:
UPDATE:

Had a training session with the ikemen trainer at my gym today 🙈

Y'all I have so many feelings about it so I'm gonna dump them here for a sec

author: Mellae
text: Sorry for the emotional dumping lol but this pattern has just been a source of frustration & have no idea how to break the cycle 😭

author: Mellae
text:
It's so much more fun hanging out with my friends & hanging out with myself right now

But one thing I think about is that I do want a romantic relationship & I cannot just sit passively and expect it to happen? Esp not in these times so idk... Feels like a rock & hard place

author: Mellae
text:
Like I ended up going to my favourite izakaya by myself & treating myself to a date night instead

& somehow I just feel so relieved 😅

Idk maybe I'm not ready to start dating again? I just don't feel excited or interested in any of these people I talk to...

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so basically I got back onto dating apps after taking a 6 month break & was technically supposed to go on a date today

Planned to meet at 9pm after work (currently 9:10pm) & hadn't heard anything all day from the other person & I'm genuinely not even upset or anything

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all I swear it is not possible for someone as cute as Ohashi-kun to exist

He's not reaaaaal 😭

His Jweb is so cute my heart hurts 💚😅🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Returned to work this week after my trip to Osaka & been so busy so I haven't had much time/energy to invest in Johnny's stuff

Had a random thought today that I hadn't really been thinking about Fuma that much recently then realised that IS thinking about him 😂

author: Mellae
text: Hope all the US Arashians enjoy RoM today ❤️💛💚💜💙🌈✨

author: Mellae
text:
I realized my Johnny's type is:

Looks like a squirrel when eating 🐿️☺️

author: Mellae
text: Does anyone have any good Fuma phone wallpapers?? Or know where I can find some?? 🙏🏽🙏🏽🙏🏽

author: Mellae
text:
Fuma's skin in these pics ✨✨✨

🙈💜 https://t.co/gBSMcZn9RG

author: Mellae
text: Ohashi is so cute like I am so weak against him 😭

author: Mellae
text:
I think it's so funny when people see Yama with other Johnny's (not JUMP) & they're surprised that he is short 😂

He has always been a smol boy 😅 so I just never get surprised - I think it makes him so cute 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
& this boy ignores my comment 😂 and I don't really remember clearly what happened after that but I remember waking up & having 2nd hand embarrassment at our awful flirting - it was like a real cheesy romcom y'all 😅

Anyway! I had fun even in my dreams 👍🏼🥰

author: Mellae
text: And then - this makes no sense - he threw his hoodie at me (he wasn't wearing it - he just went to get it & threw it at me) & it was the hoodie he was wearing in yesterday's YouTube Live 🙈😂 So I made some lame joke like "as if I wasn't warm enough" or something

author: Mellae
text: So I was wearing this black jacket in the dream & he kept telling me that I was wearing too much/it was too warm & that I need to take my jacket off & he would do this with a lot of stroking/pulling on the jacket

author: Mellae
text:
Had my first(?) dream about Fuma & lemme tell you about it 😂

Idk where we were or who else was maybe in the dream but Fuma & I were indoors somewhere. He was being like super annoying 😅 & I mean that in a loving way

author: Mellae
text:
Excuse me but why is Nakamaru like so shippable with everyone??!!

He's so cute 💜

And all he has to do is exist!! 😱😭🥰

author: Mellae
text:
I'm going back to Tokyo tomorrow & I feel like being in Osaka has just been an escape from reality

Like this trip was not even real 😅

I know I can't run away from life but sometimes it's nice....

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all I'm in a random bar in Osaka - drinking & scrolling on my phone

So I decided to bite the bullet & sign up for Jweb... Coz I'm bored

& It should be illegal for Fuma to upload photos there 🙈🙈🙈🙈

Had to control myself so I didn't squeal out loud 😂

author: Mellae
text:
It's weird to say but sometimes I miss Nino - like when I look at him & it feels different because I'm in a different place in my life & so is he!

But I miss that time in my life 💛🥺

Still love u to the moon and back tho Neen 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
I saw some random Ohmiya skinship pop up on my timeline & it really reminded me of why Nino was my no.1 initially

As someone who's love language is physical touch I feel like I just knew we'd get along 😂

I just felt like we were the same somehow 💛

author: Mellae
text:
I did not know that Fuma with black hair would affect me this much...

Like why am I reacting like this when I've seen him with black hair like 1000x?!!

I guess this is love huh 💜😂

author: Mellae
text:
LRT but for real

Why do I look at Fuma and just feel like I need a bf asap?! 🙄😭

I don't need one lol but I want one & I want him to be like Fuma 😭🙏🏽

author: Mellae
text:
Sad that papajani is ending...

It really reminded me of childminder Arashi but with a bunch of Kansai boys (=much louder but in a good way)

Hope WEST will get a chance to have another variety show together in the future 🙏🏽

author: Mellae
text:
Still thinking about that Fuma hug 😭

The fact that Shingo is basically Fuma makes it so much worse 😭

FUMA 💜😭

author: Mellae
text:
Just casually crying over Fuma AGAIN 💜😭

This boy is going to be the end of me 😭😭😭

I don't wanna spoil Fight Song but all I'm going to say is THAT HUG 😭 I'm dead 💀

author: Mellae
text:
I have so many thoughts about Fuma on a daily basis 😂 I swear it wasn't this bad with Sho or Nino🤔

I'm thinking I need a journal just for Fuma things 💜😅

author: Mellae
text:
These pics are about 2 & a half years apart!

Both Nino & I have aged & continued to grow! I'm so proud of us 💛 love u always Neen 🥰 https://t.co/1DtSRWcEtf

author: Mellae
text: Literally took a trip to Osaka just for him 💛 https://t.co/Cw1TCGitDF

author: Mellae
text: Omg SexyZone summer concert?!! y'all I am hyped ✨🥰 I hope I can get a ticket 🤞🏼🙏🏽

author: Mellae
text:
Watching Fuma's new show about businesses after closing time on TV Tokyo & he is doing so great 🥰 so proud of him trying his best! 💜

Not sure about the premise of the show just yet but I'm looking forward to seeing how it might develop!

Just love seeing a lil happy Fuma 😄💜

author: Mellae
text:
Does anyone else have this struggle?? How do you manage it?

Because I really just want to be able to fully enjoy being a Janiwota without feeling so conflicted all the time

author: Mellae
text:
Sorry for the super emo tweets but I've just been kind of struggling with this whilst also getting into other Johnny's...

Idk sometimes I feel like I'm betraying Sho & Arashi... 😭

Like I think about changing the pics on my phone to Fuma but I can't bring myself to do it...

author: Mellae
text:
I wonder if Sho also has these same feelings... He probably feels it twice as much!

I know Sho loves his work and he's probably really happy to be doing his MC stuff & Olympics & news etc but I think he must deeply feel the gap of not being with Arashi (as do all the members)

author: Mellae
text:
I feel like sometimes I'm living off scraps of Sho w/ his friends or Sho x Yoshi

So it was nice today to see Sho & Aiba's CM - but that really hit home how much I've missed seeing THAT Sakurai Sho 🥺

author: Mellae
text:
I've been feeling a bit sad and distant lately when watching Sho-kun's shows...

IMO there is a lot of other Johnny's content that is more interesting atm & I guess maybe what I'm really missing is Sho-kun with other members and just Arashi in general

author: Mellae
text:
I was typing up some notes for work and I think I made one of the most amusing typos

compromoist

Like wth is my brain thinking?? 😂

author: Mellae
text:
Request to Jyanino Channel for Yama to drop his skincare routine

& Nino to come along for the ride so he can brag about how he does nothing 😂

author: Mellae
text:
Excuse me but can I make Nino with glasses in his new CM my sexuality like wtfffff 👀💛

(Sorry I'm late to this party 😂 was distracted by Fuma lately💜 Also ofc Nakamaru is a lil cutie too 💜) https://t.co/UuwtrRPSR9

author: Mellae
text: Also side note related to this - the way they write the main girl character - idk y'all she just doesn't seem likeable and I'm really trying hard to understand!!

author: Mellae
text: I don't wanna spoil for those who still haven't seen Fuma's drama but yesterday I really cried a lot hearing the words his character was saying 😭 like he was so serious 🥰 and I just fell in love even more 😅❤️

author: Mellae
text:
Also update for anyone who saw my last tweets about the hot trainer... So he was there and I was able to kind of interact with him a bit. He said he likes Monster 😊😊

And I also booked a session with him in a couple weeks 😱

author: Mellae
text:
Also today I went to the gym and I was the only one there so my trainer played Arashi for me 😭🥰

I worked the hardest I have ever worked at the gym and had so much fun doing it!!

author: Mellae
text: Also joined the WEST FC because I can't wait until August for Shige's birthday 😂 so it's a double present for Fuma haha

author: Mellae
text:
It's official! I am now a Fumatan 💜

Joined the SZ FC for Fuma's bday!! 🎉

author: Mellae
text:
Happy birthday Fuma!! 💜🎉✨

There is honestly no other Johnny's who makes me feel the way that you do & I mean (in the most loving way possible) you wriggled your way into my heart so slowly that one day I woke up and found you there everyday. I am so grateful for you 🥰 https://t.co/3C1KgE5SJ0

author: Mellae
text:
Oh no if Yamada & Ohashi are in a drama together I am definitely going to start getting interested (more than I am already) in Ohashi and I cannot afford to be in like 5 FCs and buy all their stuff because I am weak for goods 😱😭

But I am actually so happy about this 🌈🎉☀️🥳

author: Mellae
text:
I am always grateful to be a Johnny's fan but today I feel it a bit extra

Reeeeeeally enjoying my Sexy Zone 💜 & Johnny's WEST ❤️ calendars + fangirling with my friends about them on Twitter&Insta DMs ✨

Today is a great day!

author: Mellae
text:
Today after I went to the gym I went to the conbini next door to grab something quick to eat & this ikemen comes there too for his lunch it's was SOOO awkward 😭

I am still dying of embarrassment 🙈😱

author: Mellae
text: Ok so I've been going to this personal training gym for several months now & there is this ikemen guy there who I CANNOT interact with 😭🙈 my brain just goes to mush & I get super nervous. If he even looks at me it makes me want to die 😭😭😭

author: Mellae
text:
Bought the Johnny's West calendar too 😅

Someone needs to take away my phone and my credit card 😂🙈

author: Mellae
text:
Just ordered the Sexy Zone calendar 🙈

The pics I saw this morning from Anan sold me 😄 I was attacked by Fuma's shoulders 💜 and before I knew it my hands were moving on their own to Rakuten and adding it to my cart 😅

author: Mellae
text: Sundays are slowly becoming another Johnny's day for me (others are Thurs & Sat) since I've been watching Nino-san and King&Princeる regularly 😄✨

author: Mellae
text: Lol I have enough pics of Fuma saved on my phone that it now recognises him and brings up all the photos in one place with just one click 😅

author: Mellae
text:
Fuma giving Sho his present was hands down the best part of Yakai

Honourable mention is when Fuma made a joke about Ueda

I thought it was a shame they didn't have a bit more interaction but the Cat's Eye nostalgia was nice 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Ukisho looked so cute in today's VS Damashi!!

Like I wish I could see him in some American drama or something where he has to wear a letterman jacket 😂 or like a Japanese version of Saved by the Bell 🥰😅

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all have no idea how excited I am for Fuma and Sho tonight on Yakai 💜❤️ I cannot waiiiiiiit!

I hope this day goes by quickly 😊

author: Mellae
text:
Nino's new haircut for My Family really reminds me of Kotaro Koizumi 😂

I think it's so cute 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Had the absolute worst day at work today ever

Came home excited to see Fuma and I just cried seeing him cry in the drama 🥺

10s later they showed Sho's claratin CM and I was bawling 😭😭😭

author: Mellae
text: I just decided that if it brings me joy I don't want to 2nd guess it I can always change my mind later!

author: Mellae
text:
I forgot to say that I made a decision

I am going to join SZ and WEST fanclub but I will do it on Fuma's birthday as my gift to him/an easy way to remember about renewing next year 😂😂

author: Mellae
text:
Omw home stressed out after work and first thought was "why isn't Fuma on TV today? I wanna go home and watch him." 😂💜

At least today is Sho&Aiba so that's more than enough ❤️💚

author: Mellae
text:
Y'all I am stressssed

And not for fun fangirl reasons 😭

author: Mellae
text:
So I'm currently in Arashi & HSJ fanclub but since I'm now following a lot more Johnny's I was thinking about joining SexyZone & Johnny's West FC too... 🤔

Only factors stopping me are:
1. Money
2. Possibly feeling overwhelmed

Anyone in 3+ FCs who can offer their experience??

author: Mellae
text:
Saw another Johnny's fan who bought a magazine with a pinup of Yamada & Fuma back to back.

Let me tell you I have never bought anything faster in my life. Immediately went to Amazon and confirmed the order without thinking 😂

author: Mellae
text:
The only saving grace today is that I can go home to Fuma's drama 💜🥰

I can't wait! I know I'm going to cry 😂

author: Mellae
text:
Also not me then immediately after checking the compatibility of our charts 🙈

Y'all I am fully dying at my own behaviour rn 😂

author: Mellae
text: Anyone else interested in astrology who wants to analyse Fuma hmu 😂

author: Mellae
text:
Not me full on deep web searching to find more information about when/where Fuma was born so I can generate his birthchart 😂

I couldn't find a time (ofc I know that's difficult info to get & private) so it's not super accurate but I put the screenshot below for curious people https://t.co/RTMFsyszO9

author: Mellae
text:
My anxiety was higher than usual just because I hadn't been outside and interacted with anyone other than a doctor

But I saw a poster with Fuma on it in a shop and another one with Sho on the train and instantly I was smiling to myself and not worried for that moment 😊

author: Mellae
text:
Honestly Johnny's has had a huge impact on reducing my anxiety

I was worried about going to Ikebukuro today as I needed to do some errands and I recently had a kind of COVID situation so had to stay inside for 10 days

author: Mellae
text: I will live and die on this hill 😂🦈❤️ https://t.co/84Qv0t4lzL

author: Mellae
text: Also this drama is a double whammy for me because I also love Mamiya-kun 🥰 like any drama he has been in I have loved! So I just can't handle him and Fuma playing rivals 🙈🙈🙈

author: Mellae
text:
Just finished watching this week's Fight Song ep. I have no words 😳

Fuma's smile is like too much for me ✨✨✨
And when he gets all serious to do the kokuhaku I died 😭🥰

And then the preview for next week 😭😭😭 I'm already crying lol

author: Mellae
text: I guess I need to buy some Fuma goods otherwise he'll feel left out 😂💜

author: Mellae
text:
Cleaning my room today and started off with the draws filled with Johnny's goods. Purely based on what I uncovered my fave Johnny's are (in order of how many items I have related to them):

1. Sho
2. Yamada
3. Shige / Ueda

Ofc Sho won by a mile in terms of number of stuff 😂

author: Mellae
text:
Lol at the VS Damashi staff turning Kishi into memes basically 😂

He cracks me up 💜😅

author: Mellae
text: Stay safe my friends!!

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so kinda bad news...

I have the COVID 😭😟
I've been self-isolating since I had symptoms 5 days ago. But I still have to go to doctor to 100% confirm it and isolate for 5 more days... 😭😭😭😭😭

I thought I would be lucky and escape it but it got me somehow 😱

author: Mellae
text:
Finished this week's ep of Fuma's drama. Thoughts:

- Seriously want to be besties with Fuma
- Fuma is surprisingly cuter than I originally thought
- why am I becoming so obsessed with Fuma 😅

author: Mellae
text:
Just to clarify so there is no misunderstanding - I mean that I remembered why I love Nino and why I love Yoshitaka Yuriko - and I love when they co-star in movies/dramas because they are always goooood!!
(Just in case anyone thought I was saying I like them as a pairing or smth)

author: Mellae
text: So my WiFi was slooooow for a whole 24hrs yesterday coz I used my data for the month. Ended up trawling through my Arashi files on my PC and decided to re-watch GANTZ 2! It was so nostalgic for me - I remembered why I fell in love with Nino and Yoshitaka Yuriko 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Did anyone else cry when Jun gently hugged Kento in Tonari no Chikara ep 2?

No... Just me? Ok... 😭

author: Mellae
text:
JGR was so good today 🥰

Shige is my fave in WEST so everytime he is featured in the vids it's always a good time 🤣❤️

Plus he was speaking in English which was so cute 🙈

author: Mellae
text:
Johnny's gaming room is literally the best thing about this year 😂

I'm obsessed ✨✨✨✨✨

author: Mellae
text:
So a new Japanese co-worker joined my company and she is just a couple years younger than me. Today we talked a lot about Johnny's and things like dating and go shopping etc. It was so nice 😊

Plus she likes Fuma because of Jyanino Channel so I have a Fuma-friend 🥰✨

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so I'm watching Fuma's drama and I have a lot of feelings

And I don't know what to do with them 😭 I am stressed 🤯😂

author: Mellae
text: Heading home now 🚃 Excited to watch Fuma's drama tonight 🥰

author: Mellae
text:
Omg I totally forgot today is VS Damashi & Yakai day 🥳

Now feeling a bit more genki considering the relatively sh*t day I have had...

author: Mellae
text: Just in general today has had veeerrry weird energy and I am ready for it to be done

author: Mellae
text:
Just saw a girl on the train strutting up and down the carriage I'm in and saying some shit to people like "so what?!" (In Japanese)

I am very concerned...

She went away and didn't say anything to me. Just hope she is OK 😟

author: Mellae
text: On the train to work and a girl accidentally played music aloud on her phone and it was Snowman's Secret Touch 🥰😆

author: Mellae

author: Mellae
text:
I miss Sho-kun ❤️🥺
Looking forward to Yakai tomorrow 🥰😊

text: Excuse me this is so cute 🥰 https://t.co/qO2tlBVfV8

author: Mellae
text:
Also none of you asked but I had another dream about dating a Johnny's 😂 this time it wasn't about Fuma 🤣

I had a dream that I was married to Shigeoka Daiki and that we had a kid together 😅 in my dream I was complaining about how he didn't help around the house lol

author: Mellae
text: Honestly as if I needed more reasons to love MORE Johnny's... Johnny's Fest was soooo good I feel like I've unlocked new faves in a lot of groups 🙈😂

text:

Also Nino was so me when Jun was drilling Yoshi about how to answer the q's! It was indeed a familiar interaction 😂

author: Mellae
text: So I started going to this personal training gym and it's basically muscle training so they are very much into the whole protein thing. And now every morning I drink a protein shake based on my trainer's instructions... But all I can think about is Jun when I drink it 💜😂

text:
Y'all I'm sad that I didn't get a ticket for the Johnny's festival 🥲

text:
I had another dream about Fuma/Jyanino Channel... 😳

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so can we talk about yesterday's Yakai??

I cried watching the 3 of them together! It just makes me so happy that Sho has such supportive and understanding friends who he can laugh and joke with but also tell them his thoughts and feelings on tough topics ❤️

author: Mellae
text:
Thank you to everyone who retweeted and liked my posts in the last few days!

I really felt a lot of love from Arashi fans 🌈💞

I'm really glad I became an Arashi fan and that there are so many great people around the world who love them too 🙏🏽💖

author: Mellae

text:

text:

author: Mellae
text:
This week's Show Channel was sooooo funny!

I haven't laughed this hard in a long time 🥰😂

Also Naniwa Danshi are so cute 💞

author: Mellae
text:
Whenever I feel stressed my heart already hurts but then I remember that I would usually rely on Arashi to make the hurt go away...but lately it just hurts more being reminded that I can't see the 5 of them together every week...

Sorry for the emo hours 🙏🏽💦

author: Mellae
text:
So I had to tell him that I wanted to be alone with Sho and idk why but in my dream I just casually referred to him as Fuma and then afterwards was like 'uh I mean Fuma-kun' 😂

I just thought it was so revealing of my inner thoughts about different Johnny's 😂

author: Mellae
text:
So I had a dream last night and Fuma, Nakamaru and Sho were there

I asked Sho to take a picture with me and I think I called him Sho-kun. I asked Nakamaru to take the pic and I don't remember if I said his name or not but then I think Fuma thought I wanted a pic all together...

author: Mellae
text:
It's balloon day for me 🎈

I am slowly, slowly coming to terms with being a fully fledged adult with responsibilities but sometimes still feel like I'm 16 😂

But my favourite thing about today is that I share it with Ohno-kun's Johnny's anniversary 💙

So here's to us!! 💞🍻🎉 https://t.co/zsiMQbFBDQ

Happy birthday!! 💞✨🎉

author: Mellae
text: Y'all this gap between dramas is the worst - I am really feeling empty after how good all the summer dramas were!

text: Has anyone seen Yamapi's new CM? It's in English and I'm pretty sure they say something like "it's fucking unbelievable"???? 😮😮

author: Mellae
text:
I'm like oh fucking great so I have to stay late ON A FUCKING LATE SHIFT because you cannot manage properly 😡😡😡😡

I am so mad 😭 like I just want to go home on a Saturday night and not think about work but now I am raging about work

author: Mellae
text:
I told my boss and he was like ok will discuss and sort this out for the future as it's also looking like a problem for next week

And he was like oh sorry I didn't realise. If I had checked the schedules then I would have spotted the problem.

author: Mellae
text:
Ok so I am a little ball of rage atm

Had to do overtime - not because I couldn't finish my work - but because someone else stayed late in the office and I am pissed 💢😡

author: Mellae
text:
I started following the nazotoki guy (Matsumaru Ryogo) and can I just say I have no idea what his tweets say just because I am only looking at the pictures of his cat

Thank you for the daily dose of seratonin I need to get through the day 👍🏼👍🏼

author: Mellae
text: On the train to work and someone in the same carriage fainted 🥺 luckily a woman who was in front of her helped and the train staff came super quickly but dang that was so scary...

author: Mellae
text: Sho is definitely having a hot boy summer and I am here for it ❤️🔥

author: Mellae
text:
So you know how cats blink to say I love you or something, well I notice that when I'm on the train and cannot react to cute Arashi I just blink and smile at my phone like a cat 🐈😂

I must really love them 🌈🥰

author: Mellae
text: Omg!! A Japanese remake of the movie Cube 😭 y'all this is something I didn't know I needed 🥰 https://t.co/rukxQ6z9K7

author: Mellae
text:
Wow Twitter has informed me I have spent 11 yrs on the app...

I think I need to rethink my whole life 😂

author: Mellae
text:
I absolutely love how Sho holds microphones like just below his lips and when he's talking he sometimes makes a kind of kiss-y face and it's so cute 🥰

Never thought I could be jealous of a microphone 😂

author: Mellae
text: Anyway I know it's not going to happen overnight but I had to just have a little rant quickly because I'm just so frustrated at this point

author: Mellae
text: I'm happy living my life as it is and I really have no complaints. I just don't know how to move forward re: romantic relationships. It's always been the piece I could never figure out and honestly makes me feel shit about myself 😭

author: Mellae
text: that even though I literally have everything I could wish for. Like why do I care so much if I get married and have a kid? Why is it so important that it's affecting my mental health so much???

author: Mellae
text: always wanted to do and for some reason in the last month or so it feels like there is something missing. Idk if I've just used the 'I'm focusing on my career' as an excuse or something but I have had absolutely no luck with romantic relationships and find myself being sad about

author: Mellae
text: my future. It's so crazy to me that I am living my actual dream life! Like if I told 14 yr old me that I'd be a therapist in Tokyo and have all the opportunities I've had I think she would faint or just not believe it was possible. And yet, here I am doing exactly the thing I've

author: Mellae
text: For the last month or so I've been struggling a little bit with motivation and feeling drained of energy. As a therapist I am very used to seeing this in the therapy room so it's nothing that I worry about BUT what comes with all of that are these thoughts I keep having about

author: Mellae
text: Ok so since I have no other 'safe' outlet than this bird app I am unfortunately going to dump all my thoughts about my personal life here. So if you wanna read it, feel free 😂 but just a heads up for those of you who want to scroll...

author: Mellae
text: My fellow Arashians! I forgot to tell you that I found this in Yamanashi prefecture during a work trip 💜 https://t.co/NGxQb7ASKF

author: Mellae
text: You know what I realised, Jun has slowly crawled his way into my heart in the last 2yrs with his softness, that somehow I feel like I'm in a friends to lovers fanfic or something 😂

author: Mellae
text:
Sorry for the slight spoiler of Kenty's drama yesterday but...

This morning I cut my finger whilst making 🥑toast and had to put a plaster on my finger... All I could think about was the scene where Kenty put the plaster on the heroine in the drama 🙈🙈

author: Mellae
text:
Just had the scariest dream I think I've had in my whole life 😣

So yeah now I'm awake at 3am having my 3rd existential crisis of the week...
